page.title: 10FINKLEY DOWN FARM
page.content: {Finkley Down Farm}is a very popular place to visit. It is very interesting. It is situated about l mile out of Andover and it is over the other side of a train track. The entrance fee is 75p for children and Â£l.2O foradults; it is lOp for abag offood. The food is for feeding the animals. Finkley Down farm is much like any farm but you can fed the animals there. They have got goats, donkeys, horses and lots more animals, even beesand baby rabbits and chicks. There is a big barn and inside it has all old fashioned tools. There is a little room where there are two war peopledressed in old fashioned farm costumes. In this room there are also old fashioned things like a coal stove and flat iron, etc. There is a giftshop and a play area as well. It is a very popular place to visit.
